name: Music_2128.wav
keywords: ['slow rock', 'electric guitar', 'male voice', 'simple percussion', 'bass guitar', 'moderate tempo', 'emotional voice']
caption: This slow rock song features a male voice singing the main melody. This song starts off with a guitar playing hammer ons over three chords. The main part of the song starts off after this sequence. It starts off with a drum roll and a pentatonic run on the guitar. The voice comes in after the roll and the bass starts playing with the voice. The bass plays the root notes of the chords. The voice sings an emotional line. This song can be played in a movie based on the hippie culture.
